divs: Sighting Details thought i was looking at the planet mars, but marswas in the southwest sky. light started to move from South to North, then madea sharpe turn to the east and started to flicker, bye the time i was able tomove to a darker location of my work site, to observe better, objest was gone. my reaction to this was i think i am seeing a UFO and felt elated.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Keizer
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: red/orange light moving in the sky
